Lorem ipsum timeline

  • Our Humble Beginnings

    The founder Shannon Lane lives in beautiful Miami.

  • An Agency is Born

    While working with mid sized finance companies where upper management had little visibility to the employees that talk to the clients Shannon saw a solution to a problem.

  • Jekyll Theme is created

    Documentation and determining best practices will make the employees’ job easier and upper management will be better able to implement improvements.

  • Title

    Shannon has over a decade of experience Process Development Engineering in the high tech field. Now she specializes in applying efficiency principals to the finance industry.
